channel.title: Welcome on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Your Email's On FIRE !!!
item.description: Welcome to Tedium! We’re glad to have you on the list! We’ll be sending you pieces twice a week until infinity. We’re happy to have you, but we’ll try not to annoy you too much. If you have feedback, you can put it right here, and if you’d like to get a taste of what you just signed up for, here are a few of our favorite issues:
